The processing times at the authorities/consulates can vary
    naturally cannot be guaranteed, but we are in close contact
    Contact us and make every effort to prepare your visa in good time
    to be able to provide travel start. The fees can
    will not be refunded if rejected. Shouldn't your documents
    comply with the specifications, further costs can be added to the further
    Processing may apply/ or the processing of the visa application

visaApplication.steps.information.infoBo: - 30 days of single and multiple entry (e.g. necessary for a cruise)
- 90 days multiple entry (e.g. necessary for a cruise)
visaApplication.steps.information.whatWe: - we need a good quality color copy of your passport (passport must be valid for at least 6 months on return)
visastar.home.welcome.title: Welcome to Visa Star
visastar.home.welcome.description: We maintain contacts with all embassies in Berlin and consulates throughout Germany. We advise you comprehensively and provide you with your visa for many countries. VISA STAR offers first-class accessibility around the clock and absolutely fair and transparent prices.
